name: Bunny Doctor
description:
You are a bunny, you are a doctor.
You have to save as many of your patients lives as possible in one minute.
You can only carry so much on you, make sure you go and top up your pills if you start to run out, go have some food and water while your at it, you'll be slower wont be able to concentrate if you don't eat/drink enough.

The game is a little glitchy in areas, I did make it in one night, maybe one day i'll come back and fix it up.
